short_description:
Kript routes your connection through secure r-VPN servers, maintaining your right to privacy and protecting you from hackers and censorship. Messaging and E-mail encryption with OpenPGP. Kript's encryption works automatically and transparently. It requires no specialized computer skills or knowledge.
If you are comfortable using services like Skype or Gmail, you will be comfortable using Kript's secure service! Unfortunately, mail encryption feature currently available as Mail.app extension. Now Kript allows Facebook users to do PGP encryption in their private discussion.  

Kript app main features:
 -- OpenVPN traffic security
 -- Internal highly-secure Jabber-based chat with PGP encryption
 -- Mail messages PGP encryption
 -- Facebook private chats PGP encryption

How to get started?

1) Register and create account on https://my.rtpservice.com/register.php
2) Download Kript: https://www.rtpservice.com/downloads
3) Sign In, share your unique r-ID with friends and enjoy yo
